Kernel/sources/panic/panic.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #include <panic/panic.h>
00002 
00003 //Function: panic
00004 //Arguments, message (What error message to give), file (The filename of the file where the error occured), line (The line no. of where the error occured)
00005 //Return: None
00006 //Description: Panic the kernel, disabling interrupts and looping (calling asm("hlt")) should freeze the processor
00007 void panic(const char *message, const char *file, uint32 line)
00008 {
00009     // We encountered a massive problem and have to stop.
00010     asm volatile("cli"); // Disable interrupts.
00011     char TBuffer[128];
00012     itoa(line, TBuffer, 10);
00013     text_mode_hardwrite("PANIC(");
00014     text_mode_hardwrite(message);
00015     text_mode_hardwrite(") at ");
00016     text_mode_hardwrite(file);
00017     text_mode_hardwrite(":");
00018     text_mode_hardwrite(TBuffer);
00019     text_mode_hardwrite("\n");
00020     
00021     // Halt by going into an infinite loop.
00022     for(;;)
00023     {
00024         asm volatile("hlt");
00025     }
00026 }
00027 
00028 void panic_assert(const char *file, uint32 line, const char *desc)
00029 {
00030     // An assertion failed, and we have to panic.
00031     asm volatile("cli"); // Disable interrupts.
00032     char TBuffer[128];
00033     itoa(line, TBuffer, 10);
00034 
00035     text_mode_hardwrite("ASSERTION-FAILED(");
00036     text_mode_hardwrite(desc);
00037     text_mode_hardwrite(") at  h");
00038     text_mode_hardwrite(file);
00039     text_mode_hardwrite(":");
00040     text_mode_hardwrite(TBuffer);
00041     text_mode_hardwrite("\n");
00042     // Halt by going into an infinite loop.
00043     for(;;)
00044     {
00045         asm volatile("hlt");
00046     }
00047 }
